org.mellowtech.core.io

Interface RecordFile

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SplitRecordFile
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFile, CachedRecordFile, IteratingSpannedBlockFile, MemBlockFile, MemSplitBlockFile, SpannedBlockFile, SplitBlockFile, VariableRecordFile

    public interface RecordFile
    A file that that stores byte records. Implementations of this class is free to use any number of underlying files Date: 2013-03-11 Time: 07:55
    Author:
    Martin Svensson
